creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: three men relaxing in the shade at L: one is seated on a carved bench holding a staff; another is seated on the ground, and one is reclining on stomach, resting head in hand; ruins at R
inscription:
Inscription

-- numbered in plate at lower left: 6 
-- publisher inscribed at lower left: Israel ex.
-- in graphite on verso, center of sheet: Dev 109 11/11
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Three Pilgrims Resting beside a Wall, From Caprices, Plate 6
